pullRequest.title: Improve error msg for CCS request on node without remote cluster role
pullRequest.bodyText:
If a CCS request executes on a node without the remote cluster client role, then it will fail with IndexNotFoundException. The error message is quite misleading. We should instead report that the node does not have the remote cluster client role instead.
Closes #59683

commit.message: Reroute CCS request to node with remote cluster role

nodes.bodyText: I am not too sure about IllegalStateException here. It's more like a user error as they should rather send the request to another node? Maybe IllegalArgumentException would be more appropriate but I am not 100% happy with it either
would it be possible to verify what status code would get returned to users at the REST layer?
